name: Let's Go Adventuring!
description:
You and your hooligan astronaut buddy decide to go joyriding around the galaxy on your space ship. Unfortunately you're not very good drivers and keep crash landing on random planets. The local alien authorities, now aware of your bad driving skills, lock your spaceship away and you're stuck! Solve the puzzles on each planet to get access to your ship...let's hope you're better at stealing it than you are at driving it!

Controls:

  • Gamepads (Left stick + A)
  • WASD + Left Shift (P1)
  • Arrows + Right Shift (P2)
  • M+N to change scenes
